short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a shortcut to navigate to a jira ticket page using the key in clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you got a jira ticket ID in your mail or github PR description and you'd like to check the details of that issue, this extension can help you open the ticket in a new tab.
